subject: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Sir
Alternative arrangement
Your fund can be move to our correspondent bank in Madrid Spain through a fiduciary agency,you will be required to travel and meet with them to assist you open an account and deposit your funds, you can now stay and further transfer your funds to your local account before you fly back ..
If this okay by you ,please Contact me immediately so I will send you the information to meet with the officials in Madrid Spain.
Best regards.
Mr. Tan Kerry.
(United Nation Officer)

subject: Re:    Dear Sir
body:
Dear Mr. Tan Kerry,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am open to the idea of traveling to Madrid, Spain to facilitate this process. However, before proceeding further, I would like to understand more about the process and any potential costs involved.

Could you please provide me with more details about what will be required of me in Madrid? Also, could you please clarify who these officials are that I will be meeting?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Emily
